Scale

EJ Vape Liquidizer Kit

LLQ001

Log in for pricing

Vaporization has created a new universe of possibilities to enjoy herbs usually smoked. For some years now both electronic cigarettes and portable herbal vaporizers have been available, but both have drawbacks. Electronic cigarettes are sold with industrially produced chemical flavorings containing nothing that has ever resembled an actual plant or herb. Portable herbal vaporizers are much larger than an e-cig and are troublesome to refill. There has never been a more compact, portable or efficient means of enjoying your extracts than the EJvape.

1 Liquidizer Stand-Alone Butane Herbal Extractor
1 Glass Beaker
